Content:: The Raetovari (or Raetobari, German: Rätovarier, Latin: Raetovarii/Raetobarii) were an Alamannic tribe in the region of the Nördlinger Ries in the west of the German state of Bavaria. They were mentioned by the Roman historian Ammianus Marcellinus (330–395). This article about an ethnic group in Europe is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
